p: Analysis of the five batches 65 of the essential oil showed detectable concentrations of citropten (60.9–96.3 mg/kg), 5‐geranyloxy‐7‐methoxycoumarin (< 6–185.7 mg/kg) and 5‐MOP (4.12–8.32 mg/kg) in all batches, whereas maple lactone was below the LOD (< 5 mg/kg), as were isopimpellin (< 1 mg/kg) and 5‐geranyloxypsoralen (< 0.5 mg/kg).
